descriptions: Developed and deployed multiple AI-driven systems combining LLM tool-calling, reactive orchestration loops, and custom workflows for internal automations.
Built orchestration pipelines using JavaScript and Python, integrating APIs, user prompts, and AI model calls for seamless reactive behavior.
Created a fully-automated Intern Hiring Platform handling 1000+ applicants daily, using quiz-based and timed voice assessments, evaluated with LLMs.
Deployed the platform on Vercel, ensured real-time performance, and implemented analytics and role-based access control.
Engineered full-stack features including dashboards, user interfaces, and REST APIs to monitor and manage automation flows.
Real-time attendance tracker used by multiple professors at my college.
Role-based access for teachers with secure subject-wise tracking.
Generates Date-wise, Monthly, and Semester-wise reports.

Projects.tech_stack: Next.js, React Hook Form, Zod, Shadcn, Tailwind
descriptions: Automated faculty exam duty and room allocation system.
Fair duty distribution with form validation using React Hook Form & Zod.
Built responsive UI with Shadcn components and Tailwind CSS.
